You won't see jack shit if you don't get the membership. I know that's not something you were hoping to hear, but it's just the way it is.

Choose one of the 3 memberships

I'm telling you right away that you won't be able to get enough of the porn this place has, so if you plan on becoming a member, choose the regular monthly membership. Why? Well, if you get switched over to the monthly plan from the trial plan, you will have to pay $5 more than you usually would. The price of the normal monthly membership is $20, which still sounds like a lot. Luckily, there's the 3rd membership, and it seems like the best one, but only if you plan on sticking around.

Purchasing an annual membership is not a small thing. You have to really like what the site offers to get it. Anyway, this membership costs $132 monthly, which sounds crazy. However, when you look at it like you did the memberships before, you will see that it's actually a lot cheaper. It comes to only $11 monthly, which is about 45% cheaper.

Under 1.000 Indian videos

The collection that's currently available might not be big, but it seems better than the ones I've seen before. I know that this place is supposed to be filled with professional porn videos, but I can't say that I got that feeling when looking at these scenes.

Usually, you can tell just by looking at a thumbnail picture whether the video is amateur or professional. It would be pretty damn good if there was a way to separate these videos, but it doesn't seem like there is. Don't get me wrong, there are some filters, but there's simply nothing that would separate amateur videos from professional ones.

Every video has a free trailer

One thing they did right on SpiceVids.com is that you can check out what the scene is about just by hovering your cursor over the scene. The trailer will start playing, and if you like what you see in those 10 seconds, you can go ahead and watch the entire thing.

It's much better when you have a preview like this one, as opposed to the one where you get to see a couple of screenshots from the video. I'm always saying that a video, even a short one, is much better than a dozen pictures, and nothing will change my mind about that. So, if you have no idea what to expect from these videos, just watch the previews and you'll get all the answers.

You won't get any information about the scenes unless you are a premium member. You'll just end up on a page with the trailer and a bunch of information about the site. I mean, that's still better than not getting anything, but it would be nice if we got to see some categories besides the Indian one, of course.

They have only 3 sets of filters

The only things that seem useful in this case are categories. You can select multiple categories at once, but I'd be careful about doing too much. For example, I picked another category besides the Indian one and ended up with under 100 videos. Okay, maybe that wouldn't have happened if I didn't pick the anal category, but you get my point.

There's a pretty big chance that most of those categories have nothing to do with Indian porn, but it doesn't hurt to try, right? The site is pretty responsive, so you won't have to waste time on loading. If something doesn't pop up when you click on it, it's because it doesn't exist. You won't have to worry about loading because everything loads almost instantly, which means you can start watching porn almost immediately.

If I had a say in it, I would add one sorting option. At the moment, you can only sort videos by rating and view count. None of those things really matter to me in this case. If there were a lot more videos, then sure, but that's not the case. It would be nice to sort the videos by the date because if I watch something new, I definitely don't want to watch it again. It would just be easier to know if they released a new video.

So far, I can tell you that most of these videos seem pretty normal-ish. There's no extreme stuff, and I doubt there will be. The most "fucked up" thing you can expect to see is anal, but that's not really bad, right? A lot of people are experimenting, and so are Indians, which means you'll get to see around 100 anal videos.

Besides ass fucking, you can see some threesomes, but again, not too many. It seems like if you are looking for something special, then you won't have a lot of options. However, if you want to see blowjobs, vaginal sex, and a couple of other things, then you will have a lot more choices.

Upload schedule is not that bad

I'm not sure if they will keep the same schedule in the future, but in the last year, they uploaded nearly 300 videos, so it seems like they plan on making this collection as big as possible. I guess only time will tell.

Small Indian collection, but in pretty decent quality

I can tell you right away that some of the videos are amateur and others are professional, but you'll see that with your own eyes as soon as you look at the thumbnails. They are pretty consistent with the uploads, so on top of these videos, you can count on seeing 3 or 4 new scenes every week. However, if you want to watch any one of these videos, you'll need a membership because SpiceVids is a premium porn site, after all!
